title: Where is the best place to study business? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest it doesn't matter where you study business, what I believe that matters is that you get some hands on experience in business. Find someone that is in an industry that you want to pursue, they are the business owner, be their apprentice. That insight might be way more valuable than sitting in the classroom.
As far as i know the best place study business is Harvard University . If you can afford then HU would be the best best place to study business.
